sitemapList.title: Sitemaps
sitemapList.subtitle: Manage sitemaps to include them into index sitemap.xml

formSitemap.descriptionSitemapLocation: Specify a relative URL for the sitemap that is unique within the context of the index sitemap. For example: 'categories/electronics.xml', 'products.xml'. Avoid using 'sitemap.xml' in the sitemap path
formSitemap.sitemapIndexErrorMessage: Avoid using "sitemap.xml" as the sitemap location
formSitemap.sitemapSitemapLocationExistErrorMessage: This sitemap location is already in use
formSitemap.descriptionSitemapItemsLocation: Define the pattern to generate sitemap item URLs.  Use {slug} to include the SEO semantic URL part based on the store's SEO 'Links Settings' rules. For example: /my-page/{slug}

formCustomSitemapItem.descriptionUrlTemplate: Specify a relative URL for custom items. For example: /about-us or /my-folder/my-page

labels.download-url: You can find sitemap.xml at the following URL

sitemap-delete.title: Delete confirmation
sitemap-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected sitemaps?

sitemapItems-delete.title: Remove confirmation
sitemapItems-delete.message: Are you sure you want to remove selected items from sitemap?

discardChanges.title: Save changes
discardChanges.message: The sitemap has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

errorMessages.filenameNotUnique: Sitemap with this filename already exists

permissions.sitemaps:access: Access to open a sitemaps blade
permissions.sitemaps:exportToStoreAssets: Allows manual export to store assets

Sitemap.RecordsLimitPerFile.title: Records limit
Sitemap.RecordsLimitPerFile.description: Set the maximum number of records allowed in each sitemap file. Search engine crawlers accept sitemap files with fewer than 50,000 URLs and a file size under 10 MB

Sitemap.FilenameSeparator.title: Filename separator
Sitemap.FilenameSeparator.description: Define the separator used between the sitemap filename and its part if the number of items exceeds the records limit per file

Sitemap.SearchBunchSize.title: Search bunch size
Sitemap.SearchBunchSize.description: Specify the size of search item bunches, for example, for catalog search

Sitemap.AcceptedFilenameExtensions.title: Accepted file extensions
Sitemap.AcceptedFilenameExtensions.description: List the file extensions for static content to include in the sitemap, separated by commas. For example: '.md, .html'

Sitemap.IncludeImages.title: Image inclusion in sitemap
Sitemap.IncludeImages.description: Enable/ disable inclusion of images in sitemap generation

Sitemap.ProductPageUpdateFrequency.title: Product page update frequency
Sitemap.ProductPageUpdateFrequency.description: Set how often the product pages are updated. This informs search engines but may not align exactly with their crawling frequency

Sitemap.ProductPagePriority.title: Product page priority
Sitemap.ProductPagePriority.description: Define the priority of product page URLs relative to others on your site. Use values from 0.0 to 1.0. This only indicates importance to crawlers and does not affect comparisons with pages on other sites

Sitemap.CategoryPageUpdateFrequency.title: Category page update frequency
Sitemap.CategoryPageUpdateFrequency.description: Set how often the category pages are updated. This informs search engines but may not align exactly with their crawling frequency

Sitemap.BlogPageUpdateFrequency.title: Blog page update frequency
Sitemap.BlogPageUpdateFrequency.description: Set how often the blog pages are updated. This informs search engines but may not align exactly with their crawling frequency

Sitemap.CategoryPagePriority.title: Category page priority
Sitemap.CategoryPagePriority.description: Define the priority of category page URLs relative to others on your site. Use values from 0.0 to 1.0. This only indicates importance to crawlers and does not affect comparisons with pages on other sites

Sitemap.BlogPagePriority.title: Blog page priority
Sitemap.BlogPagePriority.description: Define the priority of blog page URLs relative to others on your site. Use values from 0.0 to 1.0. This only indicates importance to crawlers and does not affect comparisons with pages on other sites

Sitemap.ExportToAssets.EnableExportToAss.title: Export sitemap files by job
Sitemap.ExportToAssets.EnableExportToAss.description: Enable/ disable export to store assets folder. Save all sitemap artifacts to 'stores/{storeId}/sitemap' asset folder

Sitemap.ExportToAssets.JobCronExpression.title: Export to assets cron expression
Sitemap.ExportToAssets.JobCronExpression.description: Configure the cron expression for export sitemap files to store assets folder by schedule. By default, '0 0 * * *' daily at 00:00

VirtoCommerce.Sitemaps.description: Export/Import sitemaps with all sitemap items
